original: atha khalu sucandro gṛhapatir bhagavantam anekaśatasahasraṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavataḥ
analyzed: atha khalu sucandraḥ gṛhapatiḥ bhagavantam aneka śata sahasram pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavataḥ

original: pādau śirasābhivandya bhagavantaṃ punaḥ punar avalokya bhagavato 'ntikāt svagṛhaṃ prakrāntaḥ /
analyzed: pādau śirasā abhivandya bhagavantam punar punar avalokya bhagavataḥ antikāt sva gṛham prakrāntaḥ

original: prakramya ca sa gṛhapatir ābhyantaraṃ praviśyādrākṣīt paripūrṇasarvadhanadhānyaratnajātasamṛddhaṃ
analyzed: prakramya ca sa gṛhapatiḥ ābhyantaram praviśya adrākṣīt paripūrṇa sarva dhana dhānya ratna jāta samṛddham

original: sarvopakaraṇaiś ca kośakoṣṭhāgārāṇi ca paripūrṇāni dṛṣṭā ca vismito hṛṣṭatuṣṭa udagra
analyzed: sarva upakaraṇaiḥ ca kośa koṣṭhāgārāṇi ca paripūrṇāni dṛṣṭā ca vismitaḥ hṛṣṭa tuṣṭaḥ udagra
ātta manāḥ pramudita prīti saumanasya jātaḥ paripūrṇa manoratham parituṣyamāṇe kuśala mūla mṛdu snigdha hṛdaye

original: buddhe bhagavati vasudhārānāmadhāraṇīṃ ca tīvrapremagurugauravaṃ prāsādikabahumāne
analyzed: buddhe bhagavati vasudhārā nāma dhāraṇīm ca tīvra prema guru gauravam prāsādika bahu māne
citrikāraḥ ca bodhi cittam samutpādayati sma

original: atha khalu bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandaṃ āmantrayate sma /
analyzed: atha khalu bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam āmantrayate sma

original: gaccha tvaṃ ānanda sucandrasya gṛhapater agāraṃ paśya paripūrṇasarvadhanadhānyasamṛddhaṃ sarvaratnasuvarṇaiḥ sarvopakaraṇaiś ca mahākośakoṣṭhāgārāṇi  #
analyzed: gaccha tvam ānanda sucandrasya gṛhapateḥ agāram paśya paripūrṇa sarva dhana dhānya samṛddham sarva ratna suvarṇaiḥ sarva upakaraṇaiḥ ca mahā kośa koṣṭhāgārāṇi

original: atha khalv āyuṣmān ānando bhagavato vacanaṃ pratiśrutya yena kośāmbīmahānagarī yena
analyzed: atha khalu āyuṣmān ānandaḥ bhagavataḥ vacanam pratiśrutya yena kośāmbī mahā nagarī yena

original: sucandraniveśas taṃ gatvā tasyāgāraṃ tenopasaṃkrānta upasaṃkramyābhyantaraṃ praviśyādrākṣīt
analyzed: sucandra niveśaḥ tam gatvā tasya agāram tena upasaṃkrāntaḥ upasaṃkramya abhyantaram praviśya adrākṣīt

original: paripūrṇasarvadhanadhānyasamṛddhaṃ mahākośakoṣṭhāgārāṇi ca paripūrṇāni dṛṣṭvā hṛṣṭatuṣṭa
analyzed: paripūrṇa sarva dhana dhānya samṛddham mahā kośa koṣṭhāgārāṇi ca paripūrṇāni dṛṣṭvā hṛṣṭa tuṣṭa

original: udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajāto yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrānta upasaṃkramyāyuṣmān
analyzed: udagraḥ ātta manāḥ pramuditaḥ prīti saumanasya jātaḥ yena bhagavān tena upasaṃkrāntaḥ upasaṃkramya āyuṣmān

original: ānando vismitaḥ prītisaumanasyajāto bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya bhagavantam etad avocat /
analyzed: ānandaḥ vismitaḥ prīti saumanasya jātaḥ bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā abhivandya bhagavantam etat avocat

original: ko (Vdh-DH_146) bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayo yena sucandro nāma gṛhapatir mahādhano mahābhogo mahākośakoṣṭhāgāradhanadhānyahiraṇyasuvarṇaratnajātasamṛddho  #
analyzed: kaḥ bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayaḥ yena sucandraḥ nāma gṛhapatiḥ mahādhanaḥ mahā bhogaḥ mahā kośa koṣṭhāgāra dhana dhānya hiraṇya suvarṇa ratna jāta samṛddhaḥ

original: bhagavān āha śrāddhānanda sucandro nāma gṛhapatiḥ paramaśrāddhaḥ kalyāṇāśayo dhāritā
analyzed: bhagavān āha śrāddha ānanda sucandraḥ nāma gṛhapatiḥ parama śrāddhaḥ kalyāṇa āśayaḥ dhāritā

original: vācitā ca teneyaṃ vasudhārānāmadhāraṇī pravartitā udgṛhītā dhāritā vācitā paryavāptā
analyzed: vācitā ca tena iyam vasudhārā nāmadhāraṇī pravartitā udgṛhītā dhāritā vācitā paryavāptā
anumoditā parebhyaḥ ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśitā iti

original: tenoktā ānanda tvam apy udgṛhīṣvemāṃ vasudhārānāmadhāraṇīṃ dhāraya vācaya deśaya
analyzed: tena uktā ānanda tvam api udgṛhīṣva imām vasudhārā nāmadhāraṇīm dhāraya vācaya deśaya

original: grāhaya paryavāpnuhi parebhyaś ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśaya bhaviṣyanti tadbahujanahitāya
analyzed: grāhaya paryavāpnuhi parebhyaḥ ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśaya bhaviṣyanti tat bahu jana hitāya

original: bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāyair mahato janakāyasyārthāya hitāya sukhāya devānāṃ ca
analyzed: bahu jana sukhāya mahataḥ jana kāyasya arthāya hitāya sukhāya devānām ca

original: manuṣyāṇāṃ ca yasya gṛhapater ānandeyaṃ dhāraṇī hastagatā pustakagatā bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: manuṣyāṇām ca yasya gṛhapateḥ ānanda iyam dhāraṇī hasta gatā pustaka gatā bhaviṣyati

original: hṛdayagatā dhāritā vācitā cintitā śrutimātragatā gṛhagatā pustakagatā pūjitā ca bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: hṛdaya gatā dhāritā vācitā cintitā śruti mātra gatā gṛha gatā pustaka gatā pūjitā ca bhaviṣyati

original: bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāyair mahato janakāyasyārthāya hitāya sukhāya devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca nāham ānanda taṃ dharmaṃ samanupaśyāmi
analyzed: bahu jana hitāya bahu jana sukhāya loka anukampā ayaiḥ mahataḥ jana kāyasya arthāya hitāya sukhāya devānām ca manuṣyāṇām ca na aham ānanda tam dharmam samanupaśyāmi

original: sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāṃ prajāyāṃ sadevāsuramānuṣyāṇāṃ ya imāṃ vidyāṃ anyathā kariṣyati atikramiṣyati vācā  #
analyzed: sa devake loke sa mārake sa brahmake sa śramaṇa brāhmaṇikāyām prajāyām sa deva asura mānuṣyāṇām yaḥ imām vidyām anyathā kariṣyati atikramiṣyati vācā  /

original: tat kasya hetor abhedyāni hy etāny ānanda vasudhārānāmadhāraṇīmantrapadāni na cetāni kṣīṇakuśalamūlānāṃ śrutipatham āgamiṣyati /
analyzed: tat kasya hetoḥ abhedyāni hi etāni ānanda vasudhārā nāmadhāraṇī mantra padāni na ca itāni kṣīṇa kuśala mūlānām śrutipatham āgamiṣyati

original: kaḥ punar vādo ye pustakagatāni hṛdayagatāni dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti /
analyzed: kaḥ punar vādaḥ ye pustaka gatāni hṛdaya gatāni dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti

original: tat kasya hetoḥ sarvatathāgatair iyaṃ bhāṣitā dhāraṇī adhiṣṭhitā svamudrayā mudritā
analyzed: tat kasya hetoḥ sarva tathāgataiḥ iyam bhāṣitā dhāraṇī adhiṣṭhitā sva mudrayā mudritā

original: prakāśitā anumoditā prabhāvitā praśastā saṃvarṇitā vivṛtā uttānīkṛtā ārocitā ākhyātā
analyzed: prakāśitā anumoditā prabhāvitā praśastā saṃvarṇitā vivṛtā uttānīkṛtā ārocitā ākhyātā
daridrāṇām sattvānām nānā vyādhi paripīḍitānām sarva duṣṭa sattva bhaya upadrutānām arthāya

original: hitāya sukhāya saṃbhogāya paribhogāya kṣemāya ceti /
analyzed: hitāya sukhāya saṃbhogāya paribhogāya kṣemāya ca iti

original: ānanda āha ḥ udgṛhītā me bhagavann iyaṃ vasudhārānāmadhāraṇī dhāritā vācitā paryavāptā anumoditā manasā suparicintitā ca sādhu bhagavann iti
analyzed: ānandaḥ āha ḥ udgṛhītā me bhagavan iyam vasudhārā nāmadhāraṇī dhāritā vācitā paryavāptā anumoditā manasā su paricintitā ca sādhu bhagavan iti

original: atha khalv āyuṣmān ānanda utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṃgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇajānumaṇḍalaṃ
analyzed: atha khalu āyuṣmān ānandaḥ utthāya āsanāt eka aṃsam uttarāsaṃgam kṛtvā dakṣiṇa jānu maṇḍalam

original: pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya kṛtakarapuṭo bhūtvā bhagavataḥ
analyzed: pṛthivyām pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavān tena añjalim praṇamya kṛta kara puṭaḥ bhūtvā bhagavataḥ

original: mukham avalokya yadīdānīṃ tasyāṃ velāyām imāṃ gāthā abhāṣat /
analyzed: mukham avalokya yadi idānīm tasyām velāyām imāḥ gāthāḥ abhāṣat
acintayaḥ dravya samṛddhaye sadā aneka ratnam su samṛddha kāñcanam

original: āpūrṇam asmin gṛheṣu maṇḍalaṃ namo 'stu te śrīvasudhāraṇī sadā //
analyzed: āpūrṇam asmin gṛheṣu maṇḍalam namaḥ astu te śrī vasudhāraṇī sadā
acintayaḥ bhagavān buddhaḥ buddha dharmaḥ api acintayā
acintayā iti prasannānām vipākaḥ ca api acintayā
pāra gāmi phalam prāptaḥ buddha vīram namaḥ astu te

original: atha khalv āyuṣmān ānando imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ bhagavato 'ntikāt śrutvā hṛṣṭatuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditā prītisaumanasyajāto bhagavantam  #
analyzed: atha khalu āyuṣmān ānandaḥ imam dharmaparyāyam bhagavataḥ antikāt śrutvā hṛṣṭa tuṣṭaḥ udagraḥ ātta manāḥ pramuditā prīti saumanasya jātaḥ bhagavantam

original: ko nāmāyaṃ bhagavanta dharmaparyāyaḥ kathaṃ bhagavan dhārayāmy enaṃ dharmaparyāyam /
analyzed: kaḥ nāma ayam bhagavanta dharmaparyāyaḥ katham bhagavan dhārayāmi enam dharmaparyāyam

original: bhagavān āha ḥ sucandragṛhapatiparipṛcchety api ānanda dhāraya sarvadhanadhānyahiraṇyasuvarṇaratnanidhānam
analyzed: bhagavān āha sucandra gṛhapati paripṛccha iti api ānanda dhāraya sarva dhana dhānya hiraṇya suvarṇa ratna nidhānam

original: ity api dhāraya sarvatathāgatapraśastety api dhāraya sarvatathāgatādhiṣṭhitā vasudhārādhāraṇīkalpam ity api dhāraya /
analyzed: iti api dhāraya sarva tathāgata praśastā iti api dhāraya sarva tathāgata adhiṣṭhitā vasudhārā dhāraṇī kalpam iti api dhāraya

original: idam avocad bhagavān āttamanā āyuṣmān ānandas te ca bhikṣavas te ca bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ
analyzed: idam avocat bhagavān ātta manāḥ āyuṣmān ānandaḥ te ca bhikṣavaḥ te ca bodhisattvāḥ mahāsattvāḥ

original: sā ca sarvāvatī parṣat sadevamānuṣāsuragaruḍagandharvaś ca loko bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandann iti /
analyzed: sā ca sarvāvatī parṣad sa deva mānuṣa asura garuḍa gandharvaḥ ca lokaḥ bhagavataḥ bhāṣitam abhyanandan iti
ārya śrī vasudhārā nāmadhāraṇī parisūtra samāptā

original: ye dharmā hetuprabhavā hetuṃ teṣāṃ tathāgato hy avadat /
analyzed: ye dharmāḥ hetu prabhavāḥ hetum teṣām tathāgataḥ hi avadat

original: teṣāṃ ca yo nirodha evaṃvādī mahāśramaṇaḥ //
analyzed: teṣām ca yaḥ nirodhaḥ evaṃvādī mahā śramaṇaḥ
